mapper.select: select user_name driverName, phone driverPhone, user_image userPhoto from t_sys_user where user_code=#{userId} and is_deleted=0

SELECT a.user_name managerName, a.phone phone, b.store_name storeName, b.store_num storeCode, b.store_id storeId, CONCAT_WS( '', c.dict_name, d.dict_name, e.dict_name, b.store_address ) AS address FROM t_sys_user a, t_sys_store b, dictionaries c, dictionaries d, dictionaries e, t_sys_driver f WHERE f.user_id = #{userId} AND f.area_id=b.area_id AND b.user_id=a.user_code AND b.provice_id = c.dictionaries_id AND b.city_id = d.dictionaries_id AND b.area_id = e.dictionaries_id AND a.is_deleted =0
